title: The Health Trail
description: Take an adventure and follow the relatable highs and lows of the life of an overweight teenager who feels stuck in his weight loss journey. Just when he nearly gives up all hope, he meets a mysterious old man who guides him through a series of life-changing hikes in Oregon. As he faces devastating hardships and challenges along the way, he learns more about himself, health, life, faith, and the potential to accomplish things he never dreamed possible.
author: Pure Truth Publications
